item.title: Basic setup for a Ruby-based TDD Code Kata
item.description: In the last weeks with the guys of the Firenze Ruby Social Club we started to think about organizing some Code Katas to play with test-driven development and yesterday we met to play with The Game of Life. We used Ruby and RSpec with a simple setup that I want to report here if you’d like to play with some katas. Although probably a Kata exercise won’t need many gems, in ruby projects I like to always use a Gemfile with the required gems:
